statements: SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT product_id, product_name, product_description FROM products WHERE specification_version = 2;
SELECT product_name, specification_version FROM products WHERE quality_control_passed = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM products ORDER BY product_id DESC;
SELECT product_name, product_description FROM products WHERE product_id = 3;
SELECT product_id, product_name, product_description FROM products WHERE quality_control_passed = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE specification_version > 1 ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT product_id, product_name, product_description FROM products WHERE product_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT product_id, product_name, specification_version FROM products WHERE product_name LIKE '%_widget%' ORDER BY specification_version ASC;
SELECT product_id, product_name, quality_control_passed FROM products WHERE product_description IS NOT NULL AND quality_control_passed = TRUE ORDER BY product_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM product_specifications;
SELECT product_id, product_name FROM product_specifications ORDER BY product_id;
SELECT product_name, product_category FROM product_specifications WHERE product_category='Electronics';
SELECT qc_id, parameter_name, parameter_value FROM quality_control_parameters WHERE qc_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT product_id, product_name, product_description FROM product_specifications WHERE product_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT * FROM product_specifications WHERE product_id = 10;
SELECT product_id, product_name FROM product_specifications WHERE product_category = 'Electronics';
SELECT product_id, product_description, product_category FROM product_specifications ORDER BY product_category DESC;
SELECT qc_id, parameter_name, parameter_value, qc_date FROM quality_control_parameters WHERE qc_date >= '2022-01-01' AND qc_date <= '2022-12-31';

SELECT product_name, qc_id, parameter_name, parameter_value FROM product_specifications JOIN quality_control_parameters ON product_specifications.product_id = quality_control_parameters.product_id AND product_category = 'Healthcare';
SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT product_name, manufacturer FROM products WHERE production_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT product_id, product_description FROM products ORDER BY product_id DESC;
SELECT qc_date, qc_passed FROM quality_control WHERE product_id = 10;
SELECT spec_name, spec_value FROM specifications WHERE product_id = 5 AND spec_name LIKE '%color%';
SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT product_name, manufacturer FROM products WHERE product_id = 5;
SELECT product_id, product_name, manufacturer, production_date FROM products WHERE production_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT products.product_name, specifications.spec_name, specifications.spec_value FROM products JOIN specifications ON products.product_id = specifications.product_id;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE product_id IN (SELECT product_id FROM quality_control WHERE qc_passed = TRUE);
SELECT * FROM product_specifications;
SELECT product_name, brand FROM product_specifications WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT id, product_name, specification FROM product_specifications ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM quality_control_parameters WHERE threshold > 50;
SELECT category_name, description FROM product_category ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT * FROM product_specifications LIMIT 5;
SELECT product_name, brand, category FROM product_specifications WHERE brand = 'Apple' ORDER BY product_name ASC LIMIT 10;

SELECT p.product_name, qcp.parameter_name, pq.actual_value FROM product_specifications p JOIN product_quality pq ON p.id = pq.product_id JOIN quality_control_parameters qcp ON pq.parameter_id = qcp.id WHERE pq.actual_value > qcp.threshold;
SELECT pc.category_name, count(*) AS total_products FROM product_specifications ps JOIN product_category pc ON ps.category = pc.id GROUP BY pc.category_name ORDER BY total_products DESC;
SELECT product_name, specification, brand, category FROM product_specifications WHERE category = 'Electronics' AND brand IN ('Samsung', 'Sony') ORDER BY product_name ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT product_name, quantity_in_stock FROM products WHERE manufacturer = 'ABC Inc.';
SELECT product_name, product_description FROM products WHERE quantity_in_stock > 100;
SELECT spec_name, spec_value FROM specifications WHERE product_id = 1;
SELECT line_name, supervisor_name, location FROM production_lines;
SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT product_name, manufacturer, quantity_in_stock FROM products ORDER BY manufacturer ASC;
SELECT qc_parameter, qc_value, qc_status FROM quality_control WHERE qc_status = true;
SELECT products.product_name, specifications.spec_name, specifications.spec_value FROM products JOIN specifications ON products.product_id = specifications.product_id;

SELECT inspections.inspection_id, inspections.inspection_date, production_lines.line_name, inspections.inspection_result FROM inspections JOIN production_lines ON inspections.line_id = production_lines.line_id ORDER BY inspections.inspection_date DESC;
